item.title: The Pamela Song (music video)

item.title: The Rebecca Song (music video)
item.description: This is a song I wrote when I first moved to Japan. I think it's about America and how I missed it but also how I never wanted to go back to the life I had back there. Rebecca was the name of the only friend from back home who kept in touch with me when I moved. It's not about her.

item.title: Hits R Everything (music video)
item.description: This song of mine appeared in the film Zombie Bounty Hunter MD written & directed by Pirooz Kalayeh. I didn't write it for that film, but the lyrics were rewritten by me and Pirooz to better fit the theme of the film. I can't remember what the original words to the song were. The guitar solo is by Buzz Clic of the Rubber City Rebels. Pirooz sang harmonies. The drummer was named Chuck. I played everything else.
